underlying_goal: To commit a large number of staged changes by logically grouping them into multiple, well-defined commits.
primary_success: Correctly identifying that the `slides/` directory was a separate git repository and should not be committed, then logically splitting the remaining changes into four distinct commits.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to commit a large number of staged files. Claude analyzed the changes, logically grouped them into four separate commits (CI scripts, experiment configs, findings documents, and documentation updates), and correctly identified that a `slides/` directory was a separate git repository that should be ignored.
